ygData.subject: Lvl 16 spell question...
ygData.msgSnippet: I am a DE Necro on Povar, and just made 16th. I am trying to locate a spell and have a
ygData.messageBody:
<!doctype html public "-//w3c//dtd html 4.0 transitional//en">
<html>
I am a DE Necro on Povar, and just made 16th. I am trying to locate a spell
and have a question on effectiveness on another. I am looking for the spell
Hungry Earth. I looked all throughout he necro guild and could not locate
it. Is it in another guild/town? I am also interested in the spell Banshee
Aura. I cannot find that one either but do know it takes pearls which sell
for a little over 5pp at the necro guild. So the big question is, is the
spell worth it? Any info would be greatly appreciated...
<br> 
<br>Vorrke , DE Necro
<br>Povar Server
<p> </html>
